the goal of appstream is to uh deliver desktop apps into a browser so that you can use all your windows apps as a user
uh within any of your favorite browsers on a desktop uh it delivers a pay as you go service so you are only paying for
applications when they're streaming uh all your apps and data are on AWS so there's nothing that lives on a user's
desktop itself so if you have any sensitive applications that need to be uh secure and placed in a single
location that's possible uh finally it scales globally so you just need to provide input on uh which regions uh you
want access uh from which regions you want to stream applications from and uh
how many users you want to support and the rest is taken care of by the service uh in terms of the use cases
that we see out there for appstream 2.o uh they line up in three buckets so
first of all there's business applications that are commonly used whether they are
business intelligence or data analytics applications or any of the productivity applications that are used on a regular
Windows desktop so those are those can be streamed and this applies across uh
businesses public sector edu uh all all the different uh types of customers
there then there's graphic socialization where there are customers who today run
uh virtualized workstations on premises they take 3D engineering applications
and put them in the data center uh so that uh they can then uh uh escape the
limits of the existing Hardware that they have it might be some commodity Hardware or they don't want to invest in
uh expensive workstation purchases on a regular basis so for that then you can virtualize those uh virtualize those
workstations put the 3D applications on AWS and deliver them through appstream just on a
browser uh the third large use case for appstream is around software vendors who want to take their existing investments
in desktop applications and start delivering them through a browser so uh
the use cases here range from anything from a sales demo where instead of providing a desktop app that you have to
download and try out as a user which for uh especially for 3D applications it
could be a very large install that you have to download and try out instead you can just send a link that a user can

finally there are uh software providers also who want to uh use app stream as as
